name: float
description: This property specifies whether a box should float to the left, right, or not at all.
longDescription: It may be set for any element, but only applies to elements that generate boxes that are not absolutely positioned.

left.description: The element generates a block box that is floated to the left. Content flows on the right side of the box, starting at the top (subject to the clear property).

right.description: Similar to left, except the box is floated to the right, and content flows on the left side of the box, starting at the top.
